mapper.select: SELECT a.branch_no AS branch_no , ISNULL(SUM(a.rsale_amt),0) AS sale_amt , c.sheet_qty AS orders_num , #{startDate} AS opt_date FROM pos_v_saleflow_contain_del a, bi_t_people_info b LEFT JOIN ( SELECT sale_man, COUNT(DISTINCT flow_no) AS sheet_qty FROM pos_v_saleflow WHERE oper_date>=#{startDate} AND oper_date<=#{endDate} GROUP BY sale_man) AS c ON b.oper_id=c.sale_man WHERE a.sale_man = b.oper_id AND a.oper_date>=#{startDate} AND a.oper_date<=#{endDate} AND a.branch_no = #{branchNo} GROUP BY a.branch_no, a.sale_man, c.sheet_qty
